00011 #include <openrave-core.h>
00012 #include <openrave/planningutils.h>
00013 #include <vector>
00014 #include <cstring>
00015 #include <sstream>
00016 
00017 #include <boost/thread/thread.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00019 
00020 using namespace OpenRAVE;
00021 using namespace std;
00022 
00023 #ifdef _WIN32
00024 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00025 #include <windows.h>
00026 #define usleep(micro) Sleep(micro/1000)
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 void SetViewer(EnvironmentBasePtr penv, const string& viewername)
00030 {
00031     ViewerBasePtr viewer = RaveCreateViewer(penv,viewername);
00032     penv->AddViewer(viewer);
00033     viewer->main(true);
00034 }
00035 
00036 int main(int argc, char ** argv)
00037 {
00038     string scenefilename = "data/youbot1.env.xml";
00039     string viewername = "qtcoin";
00040     RaveInitialize(true);
00041     EnvironmentBasePtr penv = RaveCreateEnvironment();
00042     penv->SetDebugLevel(Level_Debug);
00043 
00044     boost::thread thviewer(boost::bind(SetViewer,penv,viewername)); // create the viewer
00045     usleep(400000); // wait for the viewer to init
00046 
00047     penv->Load(scenefilename);
00048 
00049     // attach a physics engine
00050     penv->SetPhysicsEngine(RaveCreatePhysicsEngine(penv,"ode"));
00051     penv->GetPhysicsEngine()->SetGravity(Vector(0,0,-9.8));
00052 
00053     vector<RobotBasePtr> vrobots;
00054     penv->GetRobots(vrobots);
00055     RobotBasePtr probot = vrobots.at(0);
00056     std::vector<dReal> q;
00057 
00058     vector<int> wheelindices, restindices;
00059     ControllerBasePtr wheelcontroller, armcontroller;
00060     // create the controllers, make sure to lock environment!
00061     {
00062         EnvironmentMutex::scoped_lock lock(penv->GetMutex()); // lock environment
00063 
00064         MultiControllerPtr multi(new MultiController(penv));
00065         vector<int> dofindices(probot->GetDOF());
00066         for(int i = 0; i < probot->GetDOF(); ++i) {
00067             dofindices[i] = i;
00068         }
00069         probot->SetController(multi,dofindices,1); // control everything
00070         // set the velocity controller on all joints that have 'wheel' in their description
00071         for(std::vector<KinBody::JointPtr>::const_iterator itjoint = probot->GetJoints().begin(); itjoint != probot->GetJoints().end(); ++itjoint) {
00072             if( (*itjoint)->GetName().find("wheel") != string::npos ) {
00073                 for(int i = 0; i < (*itjoint)->GetDOF(); ++i) {
00074                     wheelindices.push_back((*itjoint)->GetDOFIndex()+i);
00075                 }
00076             }
00077             else {
00078                 for(int i = 0; i < (*itjoint)->GetDOF(); ++i) {
00079                     restindices.push_back((*itjoint)->GetDOFIndex()+i);
00080                 }
00081             }
00082         }
00083 
00084         if(wheelindices.size() > 0 ) {
00085             wheelcontroller = RaveCreateController(penv,"odevelocity");
00086             multi->AttachController(wheelcontroller,wheelindices,0);
00087         }
00088 
00089         if( restindices.size() > 0 ) {
00090             armcontroller = RaveCreateController(penv,"idealcontroller");
00091             multi->AttachController(armcontroller,restindices,0);
00092         }
00093         else {
00094             RAVELOG_WARN("robot needs to have wheels and arm for demo to work\n");
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     while(1) {
00099         {
00100             EnvironmentMutex::scoped_lock lock(penv->GetMutex()); // lock environment
00101 
00102             if( !!armcontroller ) {
00103                 // set a trajectory on the arm and velocity on the wheels
00104                 TrajectoryBasePtr traj = RaveCreateTrajectory(penv,"");
00105                 probot->SetActiveDOFs(restindices);
00106                 ConfigurationSpecification spec = probot->GetActiveConfigurationSpecification();
00107                 int timeoffset = spec.AddDeltaTime();
00108                 traj->Init(spec);
00109                 probot->GetActiveDOFValues(q); // get current values
00110                 vector<dReal> vdata(spec.GetDOF(),0);
00111                 std::copy(q.begin(),q.end(),vdata.begin());
00112                 traj->Insert(0,vdata);
00113                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00114                     q.at(RaveRandomInt()%restindices.size()) += RaveRandomFloat()-0.5; // move a random axis
00115                 }
00116 
00117                 // check for collisions
00118                 {
00119                     RobotBase::RobotStateSaver saver(probot); // add a state saver so robot is not moved permenantly
00120                     probot->SetActiveDOFValues(q);
00121                     if( probot->CheckSelfCollision() ) { // don't check env collisions since we have physics enabled
00122                         continue; // robot in collision at final point, so reject
00123                     }
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 std::copy(q.begin(),q.end(),vdata.begin());
00127                 vdata.at(timeoffset) = 2; // trajectory takes 2s
00128                 traj->Insert(1,vdata);
00129                 planningutils::RetimeActiveDOFTrajectory(traj,probot,true);
00130                 armcontroller->SetPath(traj);
00131             }
00132 
00133             if( !!wheelcontroller ) {
00134                 stringstream sout,ss; ss << "setvelocity ";
00135                 for(size_t i = 0; i < wheelindices.size(); ++i) {
00136                     ss << 2*(RaveRandomFloat()-0.5) << " ";
00137                 }
00138                 if( !wheelcontroller->SendCommand(sout,ss) ) {
00139                     RAVELOG_WARN("failed to send velocity command\n");
00140                 }
00141             }
00142         }
00143 
00144         // unlock the environment and wait for the arm controller to finish (wheel controller will never finish)
00145         if( !armcontroller ) {
00146             usleep(2000000);
00147         }
00148         else {
00149             while(!armcontroller->IsDone()) {
00150                 usleep(1000);
00151             }
00152         }
00153     }
00154 
00155     thviewer.join(); // wait for the viewer thread to exit
00156     penv->Destroy(); // destroy
00157     return 0;
00158 }
